infotexts.entitydescription.he-proteinbar1: A somewhat tasty protein bar. Helps to speed up the healing process a bit.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-chips1: Dried pomegrenade chips. A popular little snack to watch the annual 'DUNWICE FACE-OFF' to.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-chips2: Dried mutated pomegrenade chips. A popular little snack. It is said to speed up the healing of burns a bit.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-burgerbun: Used in the making of burgers.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-breadslices: Two slices of bread. Great for making sandwiches!
infotexts.entitydescription.he-sandwichbbjam: A tasty sandwich with bubbleberry jam.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-sandwichpgjam: A tasty sandwich with pomegrenade jam.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-cookedjerky: A few stripes of jerky. A cheap and easy meal to make. It's impossible to tell what it's made of, but the taste is ok. Eating it makes you thirsty and doesn't give you any benefits other than satiating you.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-spinelingburger: Eating it leaves a stinging sensation.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-spinelinghotdog: Eating it leaves a stinging sensation.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-cookedspinelingnugg: Eating it leaves a stinging sensation.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-cookedspinelingkeba: Eating it leaves a stinging sensation.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-huskburger: Got a prickly taste to it.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-huskhotdog: Got a prickly taste to it.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-cookedhusknugget: Got a prickly taste to it.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-cookedhuskfilet: Got a prickly taste to it.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-watcherburger: The taste leaves you staring holes into the air.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-watcherhotdog: The taste leaves you staring holes into the air.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-cookedwatchernugget: The taste leaves you staring holes into the air.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-cookedwatchersteak: The taste leaves you staring holes into the air.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-molochburger: The taste makes you feel resilient.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-molochhotdog: The taste makes you feel resilient
infotexts.entitydescription.he-cookedmolochnugget: The taste makes you feel resilient
infotexts.entitydescription.he-cookedmolochsteak: The taste makes you feel resilient
infotexts.entitydescription.he-molochsushi: The taste makes you feel resilient
infotexts.entitydescription.he-madnessmealcrawler:
Content:
 - 1x Crawler Burger
 - 8x Crawler Nuggets
 - 1x Can of Couwola Cola
 - 1x Random Toy
infotexts.entitydescription.he-mrecrawler: Menu: Crawler. Open it up to get 2 rations.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-mrecrawlerration: Menu: Crawler. A very filling meal, ready-to-eat. Just pour water in it and enjoy.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-cookedcrawlerfilet: The taste is awful, but that's not unusual on Europa.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-cookedcrawlernugget: The taste is awful, but that's not unusual on Europa.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-cookedhumanfilet: Tastes like pork, a little bit more bitter, stronger.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-humanburger: Has a slight bitter taste to it.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-humanhotdog: Has a slight bitter taste to it.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-cookedhumannugget: Has a slight bitter taste to it.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-madnessmealmudrapto:
Content:
 - 1x Mudraptor Burger
 - 8x Mudraptor Nuggets
 - 1x Can of Couwola Cola
 - 1x Random Toy
infotexts.entitydescription.he-mremudraptor: Menu: Mudraptor. Open it up to get 2 rations.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-mremudraptorration: Menu: Mudraptor. A very filling meal, ready-to-eat. Just pour water in it and enjoy.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-mrehammerhead: Menu: Hammerhead. Open it up to get 2 rations.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-mrehammerheadration: Menu: Hammerhead. A very filling meal, ready-to-eat. Just pour water in it and enjoy.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-hammerheadburger: Mhhh it's so tasty, you'd like to smash your head in disbelief!
infotexts.entitydescription.he-hammerheadhotdog: Mhhh it's so tasty, you'd like to smash your head in disbelief!
infotexts.entitydescription.he-cookedhammerheadspa: A delicious meal with a strong taste.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-cookedhammerheadnug: Mhhh it's so tasty, you'd like to smash your head in disbelief!
infotexts.entitydescription.he-mrethresher: Menu: Thresher. Open it up to get 2 rations.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-mrethresherration: Menu: Thresher. A very filling meal, ready-to-eat. Just pour water in it and enjoy.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-cookedthresherfilet: It's flabby and a bit slimey.
infotexts.entitydescription.popnut: Kids love to play with them. Needs to be put in water to pop it open and be able to consume it.
infotexts.entitydescription.popnutpopped: It's popped open, ready to be consumed. Used in some recipes.
infotexts.entitydescription.badpopnutpopped: It's popped open, ready to be consumed. Used in some recipes. Might be dangerous to leave it in the water.
infotexts.entitydescription.bubbleberryvineseed: Plant it in a planter to grow bubbleberries.
infotexts.entitydescription.popnutvineseed: Plant it in a planter to grow Popnuts.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-energydrink1: A refreshing energy drink. Good for when you're absolutely shit-faced and need to sober up a bit.
infotexts.entitydescription.rum: A strong alcoholic beverage. |Alcoholic Beverage |Decrease Psychosis |Decrease Hallucinations |Decrease Husk Infection (If below 90%) |Heal Damage |Increase Psychosis Resistance
infotexts.entitydescription.he-rum: A very strong rum enriched with uranium for extra spice. |Alcoholic Beverage |Decrease Psychosis |Decrease Hallucinations |Decrease Husk Infection (If below 90%) |Healing Properties |Increase Psychosis Resistance |Increase Radiation Sickness (Slightly)
infotexts.entitydescription.he-whiskey: Doctor Michael's original whiskey. Approved by Doctors europa-wide. |Alcoholic Beverage |Reduce Hallucinations |Reduce Effects of Halucinova |Reduce Chem Addiction |Increase Psychosis Resistance |Slight Healing Properties
infotexts.entitydescription.he-halucinova: Keep away from "Sadashi Kira" at all cost! |Alcoholic Beverage |Increase Hallucinations | Slight Healing Properties
infotexts.entitydescription.he-beer: A popular beer amongst coalition station inhabitants. |Alcoholic Beverage |Increase Psychosis Resistance
infotexts.entitydescription.he-milk: A bottle of Moloch Milk. Tastes a bit funny. Don't ask how they get milk from a Moloch! May help a bit when you're shit-faced or hungry.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-beercoalitionpremiu: A popular beer amongst coalition station inhabitants. |Alcoholic Beverage |Increase Psychosis Resistance
infotexts.entitydescription.he-beerjovianforce: A beer most popular amongst the Separatists. |Alcoholic Beverage |Increase Psychosis Resistance
infotexts.entitydescription.he-beerliquidascension: A popular beer amongst members of the church of husk on their way to ascension! |Alcoholic Beverage |Increase Psychosis Resistance |Increase Pressure Immunity |Oxygen Not Included |May contain traces of husk parasites
infotexts.entitydescription.he-beerclownjuice: A popular beer amongst pranksters. Praise the honkmother! |Alcoholic Beverage |Increase Psychosis Resistance
infotexts.entitydescription.he-beerreaperstribute: A strong beer to pay tribute to the reaper. |Alcoholic Beverage |Clear Reaper's Tax |Clears your mind of embarrassment |Increase Psychosis Resistance
infotexts.entitydescription.he-cupbubbleberrytea: People claim they didn't get thirsty for quite a while after drinking it.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-cuppopnuttea: People claim they didn't get thirsty for quite a while after drinking it.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-colacan: A refreshing can of Couwola Cola. Super refreshing and good for when you're absolutely shit-faced and need to sober up a quickly. Mass-consumption may cause discomfort.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-colazerocan: A refreshing can of Couwola Cola Zero. No sugar, but full flavor! Very refreshing and good for when you're absolutely shit-faced and need to sober up a quickly.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-colabottle: A bottle of Couwola Cola. Super refreshing and helpful when you're shit-faced. Mass-consumption may cause discomfort.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-colazerobottle: A bottle of Couwola Cola Zero. Zero sugar, but full flavor! Very refreshing and kind of helpful when you're shit-faced.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-kegempty: An empty keg used for some recipes. Can be used in water to collect dirty water.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-kegseawater: A keg full of sea water. Can be used to refill bottles at a refill station. Can be cooked into clean water at a stove or brewing kettle. Also used in hydroponic planters.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-kegwater: A keg full of water. Can be used to refill bottles at a refill station.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-kegcoalitionpremium: A keg full of Coalition Premium beer. Can be used to refill bottles at a refill station.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-kegjovianforce: A keg full of Jovian Force beer. Can be used to refill bottles at a refill station.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-kegliquidascension: A keg full of Liquid Ascension beer. Can be used to refill bottles at a refill station.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-kegclownjuice: A keg full of Clown Juice beer. Can be used to refill bottles at a refill station.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-kegreaperstribute: A keg full of Reaper's Tribute beer. Can be used to refill bottles at a refill station.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-kegrum: A keg full of rum. Can be used to refill bottles at a refill station.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-kegpiraterum: A keg full of pirate rum. Can be used to refill bottles at a refill station.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-kegwhiskey: A keg full of whiskey. Can be used to refill bottles at a refill station.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-keghalucinova: A keg full of halucinova. Can be used to refill bottles at a refill station.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-blueprintbottle: A blueprint of a regular bottle. Can be used in a bottle printer.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-blueprintbottlebeer: A blueprint of a beer bottle. Can be used in a bottle printer.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-blueprintbottlerum: A blueprint of a rum bottle. Can be used in a bottle printer.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-blueprintbottlewhis: A blueprint of a Whiskey bottle. Can be used in a bottle printer.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-blueprintbottlehalu: A blueprint of a Halucinova bottle. Can be used in a bottle printer.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-blueprintjar: A blueprint of a Jar. Can be used in a bottle printer.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-blueprintshaker: A blueprint of a Shaker. Can be used in a bottle printer.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-blueprintcup: A blueprint of a Cup. Can be used in a bottle printer.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-emptybottlerum: An empty Rum bottle used for some recipes. Can be thrown or used in water to collect sea water.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-emptybottlewhiskey: An empty Whiskey bottle used for some recipes. Can be thrown or used in water to collect sea water.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-emptybottlehalucino: An empty Halucinova bottle used for some recipes. Can be thrown or used in water to collect sea water.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-emptybottlebeer: An empty beer bottle used for some recipes. Can be thrown or used in water to collect sea water.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-emptybottle: An empty bottle used for some recipes. Can be thrown or used in water to collect sea water.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-emptyjar: An empty jar used for some recipes. Can be thrown.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-emptyshaker: An empty shaker ready to be filled with salt! Can be thrown.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-emptycup: An empty cup for drinks. Can be thrown or filled with tea.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-emptybottlerum2: An empty Rum bottle used for some recipes. Can be thrown or used in water to collect sea water.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-emptybottlewhiskey2: An empty Whiskey bottle used for some recipes. Can be thrown or used in water to collect sea water.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-emptybottlehalucino: An empty Halucinova bottle used for some recipes. Can be thrown or used in water to collect sea water.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-emptybottlebeer2: An empty beer bottle used for some recipes. Can be thrown or used in water to collect sea water.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-emptybottle2: An empty bottle used for some recipes. Can be thrown or used in water to collect sea water.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-emptyjar2: An empty jar used for some recipes. Can be thrown.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-emptyshaker2: An empty shaker ready to be filled with salt! Can be thrown.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-emptycup2: An empty cup for drinks. Can be thrown or filled with tea.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-endwormmeatchunk: A fat chunk of meat from an Endworm. Spoils if not contained inside a refrigerated container.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-rawendwormmeat: Spoils if not contained inside a refrigerated container.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-rawendwormsausage: Spoils if not contained inside a refrigerated container.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-rawendwormmeatpatty: Spoils if not contained inside a refrigerated container.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-humanmeatchunk: Parts of a human. Spoils if not contained inside a refrigerated container.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-rawhumanmeat: Spoils if not contained inside a refrigerated container.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-rawhumansausage: Spoils if not contained inside a refrigerated container.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-rawhumanmeatpatty: Spoils if not contained inside a refrigerated container.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-rawhumannuggets: A pile of raw nuggets made from human meat. Put it in a fryer.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-crawlermeatchunk: A Crawler cut in half. Spoils if not contained inside a refrigerated container.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-rawcrawlermeat: Spoils if not contained inside a refrigerated container.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-rawcrawlersausage: Spoils if not contained inside a refrigerated container.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-rawcrawlermeatpatty: Spoils if not contained inside a refrigerated container.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-rawcrawlernuggets: A pile of raw nuggets made from crawler meat. Put it in a fryer.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-mudraptormeatchunk: A nice chunk of meat cut from a Mudraptor. Spoils if not contained inside a refrigerated container.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-rawmudraptormeat: Spoils if not contained inside a refrigerated container.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-rawmudraptorsausage: Spoils if not contained inside a refrigerated container.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-rawmudraptormeatpat: Spoils if not contained inside a refrigerated container.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-rawmudraptorroast: Time to put it in the oven! Spoils if not contained inside a refrigerated container.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-rawmudraptornuggets: A pile of raw nuggets made from mudraptor meat. Put it in a fryer.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-hammerheadmeatchunk: A nice chunk of meat cut from a Hammerhead. Spoils if not contained inside a refrigerated container.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-rawhammerheadmeat: Spoils if not contained inside a refrigerated container.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-rawhammerheadsausag: Spoils if not contained inside a refrigerated container.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-rawhammerheadmeatpa: Spoils if not contained inside a refrigerated container.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-rawhammerheadsparer: Cut from a massive ripcage. Spoils if not contained inside a refrigerated container.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-rawhammerheadroast: Time to put it in the oven. Spoils if not contained inside a refrigerated container.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-hammerheadspawnmeat: A Hammerhead baby. Spoils if not contained inside a refrigerated container.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-rawhammerheadnugget: A pile of raw nuggets made from hammerhead meat. Put it in a fryer.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-threshermeatchunk: A piece of meat cut from a Thresher. Spoils if not contained inside a refrigerated container.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-rawthreshermeat: Spoils if not contained inside a refrigerated container.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-rawthreshersausage: Spoils if not contained inside a refrigerated container.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-rawthreshermeatpatt: Spoils if not contained inside a refrigerated container.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-rawthreshernuggets: A pile of raw nuggets made from thresher meat. Put it in a fryer.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-huskmeatchunk: A piece of meat cut from a husk. Spoils if not contained inside a refrigerated container.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-rawhuskmeat: Spoils if not contained inside a refrigerated container.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-rawhusksausage: Spoils if not contained inside a refrigerated container.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-rawhuskmeatpatty: Spoils if not contained inside a refrigerated container.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-rawhusknuggets: A pile of raw nuggets made from husk meat. Put it in a fryer.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-watchermeatchunk: A piece of watcher meat. Spoils if not contained inside a refrigerated container.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-rawwatchermeat: Spoils if not contained inside a refrigerated container.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-rawwatchersteak: Spoils if not contained inside a refrigerated container.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-rawwatchersausage: Spoils if not contained inside a refrigerated container.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-rawwatchermeatpatty: Spoils if not contained inside a refrigerated container.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-rawwatchernuggets: A pile of raw nuggets made from watcher meat. Put it in a fryer.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-molochmeatchunk: A piece of moloch meat. Spoils if not contained inside a refrigerated container.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-rawmolochmeat: Spoils if not contained inside a refrigerated container.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-rawmolochsteak: Spoils if not contained inside a refrigerated container.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-rawmolochsausage: Spoils if not contained inside a refrigerated container.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-rawmolochmeatpatty: Spoils if not contained inside a refrigerated container.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-rawmolochnuggets: A pile of raw nuggets made from moloch meat. Put it in a fryer.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-spinelingmeatchunk: A piece of spineling meat. Spoils if not contained inside a refrigerated container.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-rawspinelingmeat: Spoils if not contained inside a refrigerated container.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-rawspinelingsteak: Spoils if not contained inside a refrigerated container.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-rawspinelingsausage: Spoils if not contained inside a refrigerated container.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-rawspinelingmeatpat: Spoils if not contained inside a refrigerated container.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-rawspinelingnuggets: A pile of raw nuggets made from spineling meat. Put it in a fryer.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-rawjerky: A pile of raw jerky. Cheap and easy to make. It's impossible to tell what it's made of. Put it in an oven.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-cookingoil: This one is not used in engines.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-glassfragments: Shattered glass. Can be obtained through smashing bottles or crafting them from quartz at a fabricator. Used for crafting at a fabricator or bottle printer.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-jambubbleberry: Tasty jam made out of bubbleberries. Known to quench a bit of thirst.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-jampomegrenade: Tasty jam made out of pomegrenade. Known to be slightly more filling.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-bubbleberryleaf: Can be used to make tea.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-seaweedstrip: Sea weed pressed and sliced. Let it dry into Nori.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-nori: Dried and prepared sea weed used for sushi.
infotexts.entityname.he-icecreambasemilky: Box of Milky Ice Cream Base
infotexts.entitydescription.he-icecreambasemilky: The base for Milky Ice Cream. Store it in a refrigerated container to make edible ice cream.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-icecreamboxmilky: A box of Milky Ice Cream. People say they feel more resilient for a longer period of time after eating it. A full box can yield up to 16 scoops of ice cream.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-icecreamballmilky: A scoop of Milky Ice Cream. People say they feel more resilient for a longer period of time after eating it.
infotexts.entityname.he-icecreambasepomegrenade: Box of Pomegrenade Ice Cream Base
infotexts.entitydescription.he-icecreambasepomegre: The base for Pomegrenade Ice Cream. Store it in a refrigerated container to make edible ice cream.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-icecreamboxpomegren: A box of Pomegrenade Ice Cream. A tasty snack that apparently reduces a bit of pain and makes more resilient. A full box can yield up to 16 scoops of ice cream.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-icecreamballpomegre: A scoop of Pomegrenade Ice Cream. A tasty snack that apparently reduces a bit of pain and makes more resilient.
infotexts.entityname.he-icecreambasepopnut: Box of Pop Nut Ice Cream Base
infotexts.entitydescription.he-icecreambasepopnut: The base for Pop Nut Ice Cream. Tastes kind of similar to what chocolate tasted like back on earth. Store it in a refrigerated container to make edible ice cream.
infotexts.entityname.he-icecreamboxpopnut: Box of Pop Nut Ice Cream
infotexts.entitydescription.he-icecreamboxpopnut: A box of Pop Nut Ice Cream. Tastes kind of similar to what chocolate tasted like back on earth. Apparently reduces a bit of pain and makes more resilient. A full box can yield up to 16 scoops of ice cream.
infotexts.entityname.he-icecreamballpopnut: Ball of Pop Nut Ice Cream
infotexts.entitydescription.he-icecreamballpopnut: A scoop of Pop Nut Ice Cream. Tastes kind of similar to what chocolate tasted like back on earth. Apparently reduces a bit of pain, makes more resilient and quenches thirst quite good.
infotexts.entityname.he-icecreambasebubbleberry: Box of Bubble Berry Ice Cream Base
infotexts.entitydescription.he-icecreambasebubbleb: The base for Bubble Berry Ice Cream. A very refreshing taste similar to how strawberries tasted like back on earth. Store it in a refrigerated container to make edible ice cream.
infotexts.entityname.he-icecreamboxbubbleberry: Box of Bubble Berry Ice Cream
infotexts.entitydescription.he-icecreamboxbubblebe: A box of Bubble Berry Ice Cream. A very refreshing taste similar to how strawberries tasted like back on earth. Apparently reduces a bit of pain and makes more resilient. A full box can yield up to 16 scoops of ice cream.
infotexts.entityname.he-icecreamballbubbleberry: Ball of Bubble Berry Ice Cream
infotexts.entitydescription.he-icecreamballbubbleb: A scoop of Bubble Berry Ice Cream. Tastes kind of similar to what chocolate tasted like back on earth. Apparently reduces a bit of pain, makes more resilient and quenches thirst a little bit.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-molochcheesecurd: Slowly turns into cheese. A full block of cheese will yield 18 cheese slices.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-molochcheese: Cheese made from moloch milk. Can be cut into 18 cheese slices.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-wafflecone: A cone shaped waffle for ice cream. Contained ice cream will melt if not contained within a refrigerated container.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-enableneeds: [RMB+E] Enables the hunger and thirst afflictions for the user, causing them to have to eat and drink regularly. This is completely optional and is NOT required to gain buffs from eating or drinking. Warning: Can't be disabled for your current character once it is enabled. DO NOT USE WHEN PLAYING WITH 'NEEDS' BY 'LeDoux'!
infotexts.entitydescription.he-enableextraneeds: [RMB + E] Enables the bladder and defecate afflictions for the user, causing them to have to pee and poop depending on what or how much they eat and drink. This is completely optional and is NOT required to gain buffs from eating or drinking. Warning: Can't be disabled for your current character once it is enabled.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-cleaver:
Time is up! Chop chop!

Can chop up:
-Crawlers
-Mudraptors
-Threshers
-Hammerheads
-Hammerhead Spawns
-Endworms
-Humans
infotexts.entitydescription.he-skillbooktheeuropan: "... Peek behind the curtain of time. Is that you, Robert? No, I am Robert. But I am also Doris. I am the meat. Eat of me and become one with the Worm. ..."
infotexts.entityname.he-skillbookauntdoris: THE ART OF DEEP SEA COOKING by Aunt Doris
infotexts.entitydescription.he-genesaw: Can extract a random gene from a corpse.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-antistarve: Used to wake up a patient that lost conciousness due to starvation or thirst.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-toilet: Relief yourself or get rid of something by flushing it down.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-outposttoilet: Variant of the toilet to be used on outpost modules that can't be picked up and moved by the player.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-cafeteriatable: A moveable table that is commonly used in cafeterias.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-cafeteriachair: A moveable chair that is commonly used in cafeterias.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-emptycantonic: An empty aluminium can. Can be deconstructed into aluminium or thrown around.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-emptycanenergy1: An empty aluminium can. Can be deconstructed into aluminium or thrown around.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-emptycancola: An empty aluminium can. Can be deconstructed into aluminium or thrown around.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-emptycancolazero: An empty aluminium can. Can be deconstructed into aluminium or thrown around.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-couwolaexosuit: A limited edition Exosuit produced by Couwola Cola. It is more fuel efficient and allows the wearer to breath oxygen from their surroundings while only using the oxygen tanks when needed.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-chefscap1: Show them whose kitchen this is!
infotexts.entitydescription.he-chefscap2: Show them whose kitchen this is!
infotexts.entitydescription.he-chefsuniform1: Worn by chefs all across europa!
infotexts.entitydescription.he-chefsuniform2: Worn by chefs all across europa!
infotexts.entitydescription.he-kitchencounter: Can store up to 18 different small or medium items and refill empty bottles and kegs with dirty water.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-kitchencounter2: Can store up to 30 different small or medium items.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-refrigerator: Prevents spoilage. Can only store food and drinks. Needs power.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-fryer: Used for frying stuff. Needs power.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-distiller: Used to distill ethanol from sugar and sea yeast shrooms. Needs power.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-brewkettle: Used to brew kegs of almost any kind of beverage. Needs power.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-bottleprinter: Used to mass produce bottles. Needs power.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-refillstation: Used to refill empty bottles from a keg.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-coolercrate: Used to prevent meat from spoiling. Needs a battery.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-liquorcrate: Used to store and transport up to 20 bottles of any kind.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-jarcrate: Used to store and transport up to 8 jars.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-colacrate: A crate from Couwola Cola to store and carry your bottles. Jars don't fit.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-liquorcrateshelf: A shelf to store up to 4 of your liquor and jar crates.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-liquorcrateshelfsma: A small shelf to store up to 2 of your liquor and jar crates.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-liquordisplayshelf: A shelf to display and store your bottles. Jars don't fit.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-toolbeltlunch: A Tool Belt with a Lunch Box attached to it to always carry your food with you.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-lunchbox: It's a box with a handle to carry your food around. Can be attached to a toolbelt at a fabricator.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-hydroponicplanter: A device providing perfect conditions for europas underwater plants to grow. Yields a plant every 15 minutes. Needs power.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-cafeteriacart: Used to transport a lot of food and drinks around and or store it in a more accessible area for the crew. Holds up to 30 different foods or drinks. Can be placed.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-teakettle: Used to refill cups with tea. Requires to be brewed on a stove with a tea mix contained in it.
infotexts.entitydescription.he-sprinkler: Automatically waters nearby plants within a 1m range horizontally below the sprinkler every 15 minutes. Needs power.
infotexts.jobdescription.he-chef: The chef is responsible for butchering creatures and preparing meals to eat for the crew to ensure that everyone is saturated and happy.
infotexts.talentdescription.he-hungryeuropan: You're a hungry europan and need to eat and drink regularly.
infotexts.talentdescription.he-specialeuropan: You're a special europan and need to urinate and defecate regularly, depending on what you eat and drink.
infotexts.talentdescription.he-poacher: Gain an additional [xpbonus]% bonus XP in [missiontype1] and [missiontype2] missions.
infotexts.talentdescription.he-saltybusiness: The first time you open a container, you have a chance of [probability]% to find some extra salt in it.
infotexts.talentdescription.he-fastfood: Increase the speed of kitchen related fabricators by [amount]%.
infotexts.talentdescription.he-chefattire: Unlock the crafting recipes for [itemname1] and [itemname2].
infotexts.talentdescription.he-frenzy: Increase your attack strength with butcher related knives by [powerincrease]%.
infotexts.talentdescription.he-butchershop: You're a talented butcher and it shows!\nGet [amount]% more money when selling meat!
infotexts.talentdescription.he-coldblood: You're the coolest person around.\nMeat no longer spoils and ice cream no longer melts in your inventory.
infotexts.talentdescription.he-masterchef: You've become a master of your work and learned how to save some ingredients for later when cooking.\nYou have a [chance]% chance to not consume a random ingredient while preparing a meal.
infotexts.talentdescription.he-lifesaver: Gain a bonus of [amount] to [skill].\nUnlock the crafting recipe for [itemname1].
infotexts.talentdescription.he-delicacies: Unlock the following recipes of europan delicacies:\n[itemname1]\n[itemname2]
infotexts.talentdescription.he-huskfood: You can now turn the meat of a [itemname1] into edible food.
infotexts.talentdescription.he-masterbrewer:
Unlock the following recipes of europan beverages:
[itemname1]
[itemname2]
[itemname3]
infotexts.talentdescription.he-tastyfood: Your food is known to be amongst the best and people love to be around you. Being near your crew makes them happy, giving them ‖color:gui.orange‖High Morale‖end‖ granting the following:
infotexts.talentdescription.he-piper:
Playing the bagpipes near your crew grants them the following bonuses for the duration you're playing:
‖color:gui.orange‖20 to Weapons
20% Increased Walking Speed
25% Increased Melee Damage
25% Damage Resistance ‖end‖.
infotexts.talentdescription.he-lazygardener: The time spent watering your plants was just too much for you and your crew simply doesn't look after them when you may be unavailable to do so, so you got creative and managed to come up with a sprinkler design.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.he-hunger.other.lo: The patient is starting to get a small appetite.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.he-hunger.lethal.o: The patient is starting to starve.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.he-thirst.other.lo: The patient is starting to get thirsty.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.he-thirst.lethal.o: The patient is starting to die of thirst.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.quenched.other: The patient's thirst is quenched. They won't get thirsty for awhile.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.bladder.self.high: Your bladder is too full! You might leak out at any moment!
infotexts.afflictiondescription.bladder.other: The patient could take a piss.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.bladder.other.high: The patient's bladder is almost bursting! They should take a piss!
infotexts.afflictiondescription.defecate.self.high: Your struggling to hold it in! You should seek the nearest toilet!
infotexts.afflictiondescription.defecate.other: The patient could take a dump.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.defecate.other.hig: The patient needs to defecate really bad!
infotexts.afflictiondescription.embarrassment: You feel embarrassed and can't focus on your work.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.embarrassment.othe: The patient seems embarrassed and can't focus on anything.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.he-dieofthirst.oth: The patient is dying of thirst.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.he-cannibalskillin: All your skills are increased by 20%
infotexts.afflictiondescription.he-disguisedashusk: Ugh... you reek of husk infected flesh! Husks will probably accept you as one of their own.
Ugh... The patient reeks of husk infected flesh!
infotexts.afflictiondescription.he-alcoholism: The patient is happy enough... so long as they get what they need.
infotexts.advancedafflictiondescription.self.he-al: It's time for a booze cruise! You're addicted to alcohol.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.he-alcoholwithdraw: Agitation and a tremor are obvious, as are the signs of nausea.
infotexts.afflictioncauseofdeathself.he-alcoholwit: You have died of alcohol withdrawal.
infotexts.advancedafflictiondescription.self.he-al: You have the feeling it's time to open up another cold one with the boys!
infotexts.advancedafflictiondescription.others.he-: The Patient shows light signs of alcohol withdrawal.
infotexts.advancedafflictiondescription.self.he-al: A cold beer or a bottle of rum... Anything to quench this horrible thirst for alcohol!
infotexts.advancedafflictiondescription.others.he-: The Patient shows heavy signs of alcohol withdrawal.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.he-cannibalism: The patient is happy enough... so long as they get what they need.
infotexts.advancedafflictiondescription.self.he-ca: Uh oh! Seems like you like the taste of your fellow crewmates.
infotexts.advancedafflictiondescription.others.he-: The patient certainly likes a special type of meat.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.he-hungryforhumanm: Agitation and a tremor are obvious, the eyes stare empty.
infotexts.afflictioncauseofdeath.he-hungryforhuman: Lost their mind over human meat.
infotexts.afflictioncauseofdeathself.he-hungryforh: You lost your mind over human meat.
infotexts.advancedafflictiondescription.self.he-hu: Your crewmates are starting to look quite tasty!
infotexts.advancedafflictiondescription.others.he-: The Patient gives you a cold stare.
infotexts.advancedafflictiondescription.self.he-hu: Your struggling to focus on anything. You crave for human flesh. You want to murder. Your arms grow stronger just by thinking about it.
infotexts.advancedafflictiondescription.others.he-: The Patient gives you a cold stare and is severly twitching.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.he-drunkinvertcont: Up is down and left is... right? Where am I?
infotexts.afflictioncauseofdeathself.he-stuffed: You have choked on your own vomit.
infotexts.advancedafflictiondescription.self.he-st: The stomach is at its limit. Eating more might cause you to vomit.
The stomach is too full. You feel the need to vomit.
infotexts.advancedafflictiondescription.others.he-: The stomach is full. The patient had enough to eat.
The stomach is very full. The patient had almost too much to eat.
The stomach is too full. The patient might vomit.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.self.he-internalbu: Your throat feels irritated and giving off a slight burning sensation.
Your throat is giving off a very painful burning sensation. Swallowing hurts.
Your throat burns like an open fire. You can barely speak.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.others.he-internal: The throat is red and irritated. The patient must've consumed a highly alcoholic beverage.
The throat is severely irritated from drinking strong alcoholic beverages. The patient should probably stop drinking for a while.
The throat is growing blisters. The patient must be in agony and should stop further alcohol consumption immediately!
infotexts.afflictioncauseofdeathself.he-stomachach: You have choked on your own vomit.
infotexts.advancedafflictiondescription.self.he-st: The stomach hurts and you feel slightly nauseous.
The stomach hurts a lot and you're feeling very nauseous.
infotexts.advancedafflictiondescription.others.he-: The patient's stomach hurts from drinking too much dirty water.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.he-butchered: The corpse is being butchered for meat.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.he-halucinova.self: You feel like traveling to a different plane of existence.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.he-halucinova.othe: The person is clearly zoning out.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.he-drankredpaint.s: Bruh... That's some strong paint right there! Kind of tastes like... pomegrenade?
infotexts.afflictiondescription.he-drankredpaint.o: The patient consumed and is high on red paint. You can tell by the stains around the mouth.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.he-drankgreenpaint: Wooooow... That's some strong paint right here! Do I taste salt bulb?
The patient consumed and is high on green paint. You can tell by the stains around the mouth.
Huh?!? Wha? Water! No? Yeah... This water tastes weeeeiiiiiirrrrd!
The patient consumed and is high on blue paint. You can tell by the stains around the mouth.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.he-drankblackpaint: Blyat! That definitely wasn't Couwola Cola! Though it tastes a little bit like it...
The patient consumed and is high on black paint. You can tell by the stains around the mouth.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.he-drankwhitepaint: My teeth probably never looked better! I bet they're the shiniest on all of Europa!
The patient consumed and is high on white paint. You can tell by the stains around the mouth. The teeth look very good though! Probably the best looking teeth you've ever seen.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.he-battlemusic: This music get's you going. You feel tougher, stronger, faster and more skilled with weapons. You're ready for battle!
infotexts.bottleprinter.infotext.bottle.regular: MATERIAL INSERTED\nBLUEPRINT INSERTED\nREADY TO PRINT REGULAR BOTTLES.
infotexts.bottleprinter.infotext.bottle.beer: MATERIAL INSERTED\nBLUEPRINT INSERTED\nREADY TO PRINT BEER BOTTLES.
infotexts.bottleprinter.infotext.bottle.rum: MATERIAL INSERTED\nBLUEPRINT INSERTED\nREADY TO PRINT RUM BOTTLES.
infotexts.bottleprinter.infotext.bottle.whiskey: MATERIAL INSERTED\nBLUEPRINT INSERTED\nREADY TO PRINT WHISKEY BOTTLES.
infotexts.bottleprinter.infotext.bottle.halucinova: MATERIAL INSERTED\nBLUEPRINT INSERTED\nREADY TO PRINT HALUCINOVA BOTTLES.
infotexts.bottleprinter.infotext.jar: MATERIAL INSERTED\nBLUEPRINT INSERTED\nREADY TO PRINT JARS.
infotexts.bottleprinter.infotext.shaker: MATERIAL INSERTED\nBLUEPRINT INSERTED\nREADY TO PRINT SHAKERS.
infotexts.bottleprinter.infotext.cup: MATERIAL INSERTED\nBLUEPRINT INSERTED\nREADY TO PRINT CUPS.
infotexts.bottleprinter.missingitem.blueprint: MATERIAL INSERTED\nERROR: NO BLUEPRINT FOUND! PLEASE INSERT A BLUEPRINT.
infotexts.bottleprinter.missingitem.glassfragments: BLUEPRINT INSERTED\nERROR: NO GLASS FRAGMENTS FOUND! PLEASE INSERT GLASS FRAGMENTS.
infotexts.bottleprinter.empty:
1X BOTTLE: 1X GLASS FRAGMENTS
1X JAR: 2X GLASS FRAGMENTS
2X CUPS: 1X GLASS FRAGMENTS
2X SHAKERS: 1X GLASS FRAGMENTS
------------------------------------------
PUT A CRATE INTO THE OUTPUT SLOT
infotexts.distiller.empty:
DISTILLER READY
PLEASE INSERT THE FOLLOWING:
A PACK OF SUGAR -INTO- INPUT
A YEAST SHROOM -INTO- INPUT
infotexts.distiller.missingitem.yeastshroom: SUGAR INSERTED\nERROR: NO YEAST SHROOM FOUND! PLEASE INSERT A YEASTSHROOM.
